thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 6 of 658
thread.title: Mary M
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Mary M

author: Mary M
title: Mary M
text: Overall my experience was great- I was a bit surprised at the processing time of how long my glasses were going to take (almost a month), however the staff were very helpful when I explained I was going on a trip and would need them. The representative was always very responsive, which I appreciated greatly... and I'm very happy with my lenses and frames!
